column4: Hello, i've problem with mounting HDD : http://wklej.to/5NGKw
Before continuing - do you have a valid backup?
So losing the data is not that tragically.
It did not stop working. Actually it works, you are experiencing file system errors.
So just continue with that fsck -f
kk :D. I dont lost my Linux games :D
Even if - you said your data was not worth to be backed up.
